column4: will there be an appreciable delay in uploading pkg fixes back to sid? like, would warty have the goods for a good long while before being sent to warty?
patches were being sent to Debian before we even announced Ubuntu or Canonical
regular six-monthly releases of the latest software, stabilised and bug-fixed
no, you misunderstand.  We don't upload things to Debian, we just offer the patches through the BTS.  The Debian maintainers are free to decide not to take the patches
